name: It
short description: A group of bullied kids band together when a monster, taking the appearance of a clown, begins hunting children.

name: Home Again
short description: Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.

name: Rememory
short description: The widow of a wise professor stumbles upon one of his inventions that's able to record and play a person's memory.

name: The Good Catholic
short description: Daniel loved his job as a small town priest more than anything. Then he met Jane. God help him.
